categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Ben'hade was a male Sith Lord and Imperial Guardsman in service to the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3630 BBY he accompanied the forces brought by Empress Acina to Iokath.
Darth Ben'hade appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a rare champion commander on Iokath, found only in the PVP instance.
